segments.text: Mom , I just finished my paper . Can you proofread it before I hand it in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , let ’ s take a look . Sweetie , this is terrific . Your ideas are so original .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can tell you worked hard on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really did ! I started thinking about what I wanted to say three weeks ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it was definitely worth all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let ’ s just hope my teacher agrees .
segments.speaker: S1
